issue.title: [CI] Include build log's url in the nightly crossbow report
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12819](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12819). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The github statuses/checks API contains additional context about the builds, including the build log's URL (though this may depend on the actual CI service).

We should extend the nightly report to include the build log's URL only for the failing tasks.
